SELECT s.id, s.skill_name AS name, s.status, s.submittedAt AS createDate, ( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM phd_skill ps WHERE ps.skill_id = s.id) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM teacher_skill ts WHERE ts.skill_id = s.id) ) AS userCount FROM skill s
s.skill_name LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT s.id, s.skill_name AS name, s.status, s.submittedAt AS submitDate, t.name AS submitter FROM skill s LEFT JOIN teacher_skill ts ON s.id = ts.skill_id LEFT JOIN teacher t ON ts.teacher_id = t.id
s.status = 'pending'
AND s.skill_name LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY s.submittedAt ASC
